description: This resource allows you to manage Slack notifications integration.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

BranchesToBeNotified.description: Branches to send notifications for. Valid options are "all", "default", "protected", and "default_and_protected".

ConfidentialIssueChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive confidential issue events notifications.

ConfidentialIssuesEvents.description: Enable notifications for confidential issues events.

ConfidentialNoteEvents.description: Enable notifications for confidential note events.

IssueChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive issue events notifications.

MergeRequestChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive merge request events notifications.

MergeRequestsEvents.description: Enable notifications for merge requests events.

NoteChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive note events notifications.

NotifyOnlyDefaultBranch.description: DEPRECATED: This parameter has been replaced with `branches_to_be_notified`.

PipelineChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive pipeline events notifications.

Project.description: ID of the project you want to activate integration on.

PushChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive push events notifications.

TagPushChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive tag push events notifications.

TagPushEvents.description: Enable notifications for tag push events.

WikiPageChannel.description: The name of the channel to receive wiki page events notifications.

WikiPageEvents.description: Enable notifications for wiki page events.
